name: GitKrakenGloBoards
0:
”Alexa, open Glow Boards.”
”Alexa, ask Glow Boards for cards due today.”
”Alexa, ask Glow Boards to add a card very important feature.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: glow boards
des:
The GitKraken Glo Boards Alexa helps you by providing a platform to create, manage and keep tracks of you daily tasks.
A handy tool to get updates on Glo boards on Alexa with your voice.
Things you can do right now with Glo Boards Alexa :
- List, Create, Select, Delete Boards
- List, Create, Delete Columns
- Create, Delete and List cards due for a particular date like today.
- Account Linking with GitKraken Glo Boards
